Subjects: historical poems; Halidon Hill, battle of
_description: Battle of Halidon Hill, an extract inserted in a prose chronicle — 12 couplets

BLHar4690.First Lines:
There men mighte well seeMany a skotte lightely
                    fflee…
BLHar4690.Last Lines:
…Butt Godde þatte is heven kingSende vs peas and Gode
                    Ending
